Masterclass with Football Legends – Roberto Carlos & Luis Figo is an event designed with the purpose to actively engage the vast youthful human resource football potential in Nigeria develop talents create economic value and career opportunities in European clubs through recommendations. This year’s program will feature one-on-one mentoring sessions sharing of football insights on joining European clubs in Spain England Portugal etc while impacting a cross-section of stakeholders with great interest in football. ACTIVITIES BRIEF Meet & Greet an opportunity to join other football lovers enthusiast and fans in a Q & A session with Roberto Carlos and Luis Figo for 1hour this will include photo sessions with the legends and privy of talent development opportunities with the ‘Real Madrid Football Academy” Football Mentoring An on-pitch event for persons aged (U6 – U19) with aspiration skill and zeal to become professional footballers. During this session participants will have the opportunity to be recommended based on merit/performance to European clubs in Portugal Spain etc iii. 5-Aside Game: Carlos Vs Figo Selected participants will have an opportunity to play/compete in teams captained by Carlos and Figo. Winning team are rewarded medals and overall best player will have a recommendation for trails with a European Club Executive Dinner An evening of exclusive interaction networking and a brief presentation by Luis Figo on nurturing sport talents for economic growth and creating formidable football partnerships through European Club Academies. It hopes to bring people together irrespective of their culture languages or religious background. The event is geared towards showcasing talents in jazz music and fashion as well as empowering emerging talents. The event will kick off with an Exhibition Masterclass & Mentor-ship session would starts at 10.00 am with light music and exhibition of various fashion products and other items. The red carpet for the evening session of the event would start by 6pm and main event at 7pm. The Main event would feature on the runway designs by some of the best and upcoming Nigerian fashion designers with performances from some A-list Jazz artistes. The event promises to be lively entertaining and rewarding for the audience and the participants. The Africa Movie Academy Awards popularly known as AMAA and The AMA Awards are presented annually to recognize excellence among professionals working in or non-African professionals who have contributed to the African film industry. It was founded by Peace Anyiam-Osigwe and is run through the Africa Film Academy. The awards are aimed at honouring and promoting excellence in the African movie industry as well as uniting the African continent through arts and culture. The award presentation is attended by numerous media representatives celebrities politicians journalists actresses and actors from all across the world. The AMA Awards are widely considered to be Africa’s most important film event and the most prestigious film award in Africa. Hold the Date & Book a Table! Across boundaries undivided by ethnicity or other sundry affiliations we have consistently celebrated our stars. Let’s do more this year… AMAA 2019 IS HERE! The Chef Fatima Global Food Fest (CGFF) is a family friendly Global Culture-focused Food Fair convened by celebrity chef star presenter of ‘Kitchen Republic with Chef Fatima’ on Human Rights Radio 101.1FM internationally certified culinary training Expert and Official Food Safety Consultant to Government and Private Organizations Chef Fatima I. Haruna MCFP HACCP1 CHPCCNBBQ Expert. The CGFF is an international affair showcasing a spectacular sampling of colorful and tasty culinary offerings from across ten (10) different countries as well as a broad sample of mouth-watering national cuisines from all 6 Geo-Political regions of Nigeria. The Food Fest is centered on Global culture and Unity and is themed “Promoting Global Unity through Food”. The Food Fest will also feature seasoned chefs from Europe and Africa several international and local vendors as well as official representations from Embassies and International Cultural Centers with presence in Nigeria.
